game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, the land of Tenebrous lies in ruin. The fabric of reality has been torn apart, causing temporal echoes to manifest throughout the realm. Players take on the role of a Timekeeper, tasked with navigating the fragmented timeline and restoring order to the universe.
game.beginning: The game begins in the city of Chronos, where the player's Timekeeper is awakened by an enigmatic figure known only as "The Architect." With no memory of their past, the Timekeeper sets out on a quest to uncover the truth behind the time distortions and the mysterious force manipulating them.
game.ending: As the player progresses through the game, they will discover that the true enemy is not a person, but rather an ancient entity known as "The Devourer of Time." This being has been feeding on the fabric of reality, causing the temporal echoes to spread and destroy entire eras. The final showdown takes place in the heart of Tenebrous, where the player must confront The Devourer and restore balance to the timeline, saving eternity itself.
